## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8524bc9d8b265d42f57657060e532fb65a4e0146c9529332fb2e12c8659e5d79)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'src_bootstrap_index_ts' @ 7.0.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
